org.apache.taverna.plugin

Interface Plugin

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PluginImpl

    public interface Plugin
    A plugin adds functionality to the application by providing implementations of application services.
    Author:
    David Withers

      • getState

        Plugin.State getState()
        Returns the state of the plugin.
        Returns:
        the state of the plugin

      • start

        void start()
    throws PluginException
        Starts the plugin and sets the state to STARTED.

        If the plugin state is STARTED this method will have no effect.

        All plugin bundles are not currently started will be started.

        Throws:
        PluginException - if the plugin state is UNINSTALLED or any of the plugin bundles cannot be started

      • stop

        void stop()
   throws PluginException
        Stops the plugin and sets the state to STOPPED.

        If the plugin state is not STARTED this method will have no effect.

        All plugin bundles not used elsewhere will be stopped.

        Throws:
        PluginException - if any of the plugin bundles cannot be stopped

      • uninstall

        void uninstall()
        throws PluginException
        Throws:
        PluginException

      • getFile

        File getFile()

      • getBundles

        Set<org.osgi.framework.Bundle> getBundles()
